metadata.title: CVE-2018-0496 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal issues in the D-Mod extractor in DFArc and DFArc2 (aswell as in RTsoft's Dink Smallwood HD / ProtonSDK version) before 3.14allow an attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the user's system.

criterions.comment: freedink-dfarc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
